about_the_game:
Art Pack contains more than 200 images drawn during the whole development process: first-day sketches, unique wallpapers, comics variants, visual brainstorms, different cats, production buildings, and even no-cats prototypes never shown to the public before.

To find the downloaded Art Pack please click with Right Mouse Button on the game in your Steam Library > Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files. You will find all the files in a directory named "Art Pack".
detailed_description:
Art Pack contains more than 200 images drawn during the whole development process: first-day sketches, unique wallpapers, comics variants, visual brainstorms, different cats, production buildings, and even no-cats prototypes never shown to the public before.

To find the downloaded Art Pack please click with Right Mouse Button on the game in your Steam Library > Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files. You will find all the files in a directory named "Art Pack".
legal_notice: All rights reserved. All trademarks and registered trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+, SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.9+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Learning Factory Art Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Art Pack contains more than 200 images drawn during the whole development process: first-day sketches, unique wallpapers, comics variants, visual brainstorms, different cats, production buildings, and even no-cats prototypes never shown to the public before.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Indonesian
